text: Yara Bou Rada (; born 7 August 2000) is a Lebanese footballer who plays as a forward for Lebanese club Safa and the Lebanon national team. == Club career == Bou Rada made her senior debut in the 2017–18 Lebanese Women's Football League with her hometown club Salam Zgharta. In 2018 she moved to reigning- champions SAS. Bou Rada spent two seasons at the club, scoring 18 league goals and winning two league titles. On 20 October 2020, Bou Rada moved to Safa on a three-year contract. == Honours == === Club === SAS * Lebanese Women's Football League: 2018–19, 2019–20 ==References== ==External links== * Yara Bou Rada at Global Sports Archive * Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:People from Zgharta Category:Lebanese women's footballers Category:Lebanon women's international footballers Category:Women's association football forwards Category:Lebanese Women's Football League players Category:Lebanon women's youth international footballers Category:Salam Zgharta FC (women) players Category:Stars Association for Sports players Category:Safa WFC players
title: Yara Bou Rada
